# endSearchInteraction()

**Instance Method**

Ends a search interaction by giving up the first responder and adjusting the size of the search field to the available width for the toolbar item if necessary.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func endSearchInteraction()
```

## Discussion

Use [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSearchToolbarItem/beginSearchInteraction()] and [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSearchToolbarItem/endSearchInteraction()] to programmatically control a search.

## Controlling search interactions

- **beginSearchInteraction()**: Starts a search interaction and moves the keyboard focus to the search field.
